revised_title: Similarity of Motion in Relation to Surface Friction of Fluids
tldr: The authors investigate the similarity of motion in fluids with varying viscosities and densities, and explore the limits of accuracy of the generally accepted equations for surface friction. They test the resistance of fluids in pipes with varying dimensions and velocities, confirming the existence of similar motions and providing evidence for the applicability of the principle of dynamic similarity in fluid resistance.
